metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Edina. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Encompass Wealth Advisors - Ameriprise Financial Services, LLC

heroDescription: Edina, Minnesota, is a vibrant suburb known for its affluent neighborhoods and excellent schools.
landscapeDescription: Edina boasts a diverse economy with a mix of retail, healthcare, and professional services. The city is part of the larger Minneapolis-St. Paul metro area, enhancing its economic opportunities.
uniqueNeeds: Edina's affluent demographic demands tailored financial services and investment strategies.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Edina's reliance on retail and healthcare poses economic risks. Housing demand is high, creating bubble concerns. Prepare for severe winter weather impacts.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Edina's economy is projected to grow steadily, driven by retail and healthcare sectors.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Edina is $85,000, reflecting its affluent population.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Edina are increasingly focusing on estate planning and wealth management.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Edina's cost of living is higher than the national average, driven by housing and services.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Edina's real estate market remains competitive with rising home values and low inventory.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Edina's business climate is favorable, supported by a strong local economy and community resources.
